verbose_text: Systemic L-selectin blockade reduced the number of PR8 specific CD8 + T cells in the lungs by 56% at day 4 and by 78% at day 8 p.i., demonstrating a major role for L-selectin in the recruitment of endogenously produced effector CD8+ T cells to influenza infected tissues (XREF_FIG G).
evidence: L-selectin blockade reduced the number of PR8-specific CD8
